name: Entropic Dome
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a dome of acid that rapidly dissolves anything that crosses through. Ranged attacks that cross through the dome are dissolved harmlessly. Creatures that pass through the dome take 8d8 acid damage.

You can spend 2 AP during your turn to move the dome to center itself on you again. This does not inflict damage if a creature would pass through the dome. If you leave the dome, the spell ends.
